backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing BTC donation UI features and associated files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color tokens, themes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and setting metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component assembling all landing page sections.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section describing mission and core values with icon cards.
frontend/src/components/BtcDonationDetai: BTC donation component with copyable address, optional QR code, and fallback state.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section with email, phone, location cards, and urgent notice.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with logo, mission text, copyright, and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/GetInvolved.tsx: Support options grid with expandable Donate section revealing BTC donation details.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, central branding, and smooth-scroll buttons for navigation.
frontend/src/components/LandingSection.t: Generic layout wrapper providing section structure with title and spacing.
frontend/src/components/Programs.tsx: Programs section listing four program cards with icons, descriptions, and styled layout.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky responsive header with smooth-scroll navigation, mobile menu toggle, and scroll-based styling.
frontend/src/config/donations.ts: Configuration object holding a BTC donation address placeholder.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom warm color theme, dark mode variables, and global styling.
frontend/src/lib/btcQr.ts: Lightweight placeholder QR code generator producing SVGs for BTC addresses with simple matrix logic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point configuring React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current state, features, and pending requests for the CHILDSHIELD OUTREACH FOUNDATION website.
